trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when the API is unable to connect to the server.
trans-unit.target: API 서버에 연결할 수 없는 경우이 예외가 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 인스턴스화하는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> class.
trans-unit.target: 기본 생성자는 <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException>클래스</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성은 오류를 설명 하는 시스템 제공 메시지로 초기화 합니다.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 이 메시지는 현재 시스템 문화권을 고려 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>속성은 초기화 `null`.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 인스턴스화하는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"> </xref> 지정된 된 오류 메시지를 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException>인스턴스가 초기화 되는 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성의 값으로 설정 `message`.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException>

trans-unit.source: If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `message` 은 `null`, <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성은 시스템 제공 메시지로 초기화 합니다.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: An error message.
trans-unit.target: 오류 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>새와 연결 된 serialize 된 스트림의 원본이 들어 있는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"> </xref> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 인스턴스화하는 <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException"> </xref> 클래스 지정 된 오류 메시지와 중첩 된 예외를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException>인스턴스가 초기화 되는 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>속성의 값으로 설정 `message` 및 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>속성의 값으로 설정 `innerException`.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalServerDownException>
